mapper.insert: insert into MY_CART(cart_id, member_id, product_id, product_count) values (seq_mycart.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_count})
mapper.update: update my_cart set product_count=#{product_count} where cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.select: select * from my_cart where member_id = #{member_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.delete: delete from my_cart where member_id = #{member_id} and product_id = #{product_id}
